tgt_original: āsaṃjñikasamāpatternirodhasamāpatteśca tribhyaḥ pratyayebhya utpādo'  ntareṇālaṃbanapratyayena |  cittaviprayuktasaṃskārāṇāṃ sarvarūpidharmāṇāṃ ca dvābhyāṃ pratyayābhyāmutpādaḥ vinā samanantarapratyayamālaṃbanapratyayaṃ ca |
evaṃ caittāḥ sarvakleśāḥ paṃcahetukā vyapahāya vipākahetuṃ |  vipākajarūpasya viprayuktasaṃskārāṇāṃ bhavanti catvāro hetavaḥ |  sthāpayitvā saṃprayuktahetu sarvatragahetuṃ |
